description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. They brought the war to us and the odds don't look good... Can you blast your way through hordes of enemies and take on crazy bosses to save the day?  You think you got game?  Show it off with the online scoreboard.  This ones a real button masher!!!
